name: wait-until
description: Make a promise, waiting for a specified amount of time, util something is done.

scripts.test: babel --presets es2015-loose,stage-1 --plugins transform-runtime test/ --out-dir test-app/ && mocha test-app/
scripts.test-cov: babel --presets es2015-loose,stage-1 --plugins transform-runtime test/ --out-dir test-app/ && node_modules/jscover/bin/jscover src test-cov && node_modules/jscover/bin/jscover test-app test-cov && mocha test-cov --reporter=mocha-lcov-reporter > test-cov/coverage.lcov
scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && npm run build-dev && npm run build-prod
